name: Apparel & Fashion
description: inieneral clothing and fashion retail. Sub-industries include: Athleisure & Activewear, Intimates & Basics, Sustainable Fashion, Direct-to-Consumer Footwear, Streetwear, Eyewear, and Fashion Accessories.

name: Beauty & Personal Care
description: Cosmetics, skincare, grooming, and hygiene. Sub-industries include: Clean Beauty, Personalized Skincare, Men's Grooming, Oral Care, Hair Care, and Feminine Care.

name: Food & Beverage (CPG)
description: Consumer packaged foods sold online. Sub-industries include: Functional Beverages, Meal Kits, Plant-Based Alternatives, Healthy Snacks, Coffee & Tea, Alcohol & Spirits, and Pantry Staples.

name: Health & Wellness
description: Products focused on physical and mental wellbeing. Sub-industries include: Supplements & Vitamins, Fitness Hardware, Sleep Technology, and Sexual Wellness.

name: Home & Living
description: Furniture, decor, and home goods. Sub-industries include: Furniture, Kitchenware, Home Decor, and Cleaning Supplies.

name: Pet Care
description: Products for domestic animals. Sub-industries include: Pet Food and Pet Supplies.

name: Marketing & Sales (MarTech)
description: Tools for marketing and sales operations. Sub-industries include: CRM, Email Marketing, Social Media Manaient, SEO & Content Marketing, and AdTech.

name: Human Resources (HRTech)
description: Software for HR management. Sub-industries include: HRIS, Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), Payroll & Compliance, and Employee Engagement.

name: Productivity & Collaboration
description: Tools to improve work efficiency and teamwork. Sub-industries include: Project Management, Team Communication, Knowledge Management, and Design Tools.

name: Finance & Accounting (FinTech)
description: Financial and accounting systems. Sub-industries include: Accounting Software, Expense Management, and Payment Gateways.

name: Developer Tools (DevTools)
description: Software for developers to build and operate applications. Sub-industries include: Cloud Infrastructure, Observability & Monitoring, and Cybersecurity & Identity.
